title: Jiminy Cricket's fabulous fables, fairy tales & other wonderful stories
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Walt Disney, Kevin Riem and Julie Jenkins
brief_description: Disney favourite Jiminy Cricket leads the viewer through the history of story telling, starting from Aesop’s fables and continuing through to Hans Christian Anderson and the Brothers Grimm. Stories include; THE TORTOISE AND THE HARE; THE GRASSHOPPER AND THE ANTS; OLD KING COLE; GULLIVER MICKEY; THE BRAVE LITTLE TAILOR; THE PIED PIPER OF HAMELIN; THE UGLY DUCKLING; LITTLE HIAWATHA; ELMER ELEPHANT.
